--Put This In The Part You Want To Make Deadly. (Not Model!)

script.Parent.Touched:Connect(function(touchingpart) -- [I: Fires when touched, sets 'touchingpart' variable as the touching part]
  if touchingpart.Parent:FindFirstChild('Humanoid') then -- [I: Checks if part's parent has a humanoid, confirming it is a player.]
    touchingpart.Parent.Humanoid.Health = 0 -- And we finally kill it by setting humanoid's health to 0.
  end
end)
